metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000548 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Umlet version < 14.3 contains a XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability inFile parsing that can result in disclosure of confidential data, denial ofservice, server side request forgery. This attack appear to be exploitablevia Specially crafted UXF file. This vulnerability appears to have beenfixed in 14.3.

criterions.comment: umlet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
